I STATE TREASURER'S REPORT December 1. 1920 to June 30. 1922 TREASURY DEPARTMENT, STATE OF NEBRASKA Lincoln, July 1, 1922 To His Excellency, Samuel R. McKelvie, The Governor of the State of Nebraska. Sir: In compliance with the law, I have the honor to transmit herewith my report of the transactions of the Treasury Department of the State of Nebraska, from December 1, 1920 to June 30, 1922. It would appear that the Department handled approximately fifty - two million dollars, having received to the amount of about twenty - eight million dollars and twenty-four million disbursed, as shown by the following detailed statement: DISBURSEMENTS Balance on hand June 30, 1922 Disbursements from December 1, 1920 to June 30, 1922 24,968,507.75 $29,341,829.88 If as a state official I have achieved any success, I share the honor tr.treof with these who have been associated with me in my office, to whom I am much indebted for their faithful and efficient services. Respectfully submitted, DANIEL B. CROPSEY, State Treasurer. $ 4,373,322.13 ivr^ cir x o Balance on hand December 1, 1920 -ess Overdraft $ 2,770,861.99 2,089,631.43 <et Balance - Receipts from December 1, 1920 to June 30, 1922 $ 681,230.56 28,660,599.32 129,341,829.88
